column.name: column_display
column.value: You can do tests on the genes in my spit.

column.name: column_display
column.value: You can contact me later with more questions or information about future research. I do not have to answer these questions or take part in future research.

column.name: column_display
column.value: Later, it might be possible to get the results of the tests on my genes. Please let me know if this becomes possible.

column.name: column_display
column.value: You may ask my doctor or hospital to share information about my health.

column.name: column_display
column.value: If the researchers learn something about my health issues by testing my genes, please tell my doctor about this.

column.name: column_display
column.value: You may perform (or collaborate with others to perform) DNA sequencing on the saliva sample that I will send you and store the sample until genomic sequencing was successfully completed.

column.name: column_display
column.value: You may request my medical records from my physicians and hospitals.

column.name: column_display
column.value: You may re-contact me in the event that it becomes possible to return genetic results to my physician or me.

column.name: column_display
column.value: I allow the A-T Children’s Project to contact my physician if a researcher reports genetic analysis results that may impact my diagnosis of A-T.

column.name: column_display
column.value: I agree to be re-contacted with follow-up research questionnaires and invitations to participate in additional studies. I may choose to ignore these questionnaires/invitations.

column.name: column_display
column.value: I am a legal guardian of:

column.name: column_display
column.value: My relationship to the participant is:

column.name: column_display
column.value: Reason for latest change in consent
